ba.stun.description: Unable to move, block, attack and use skills

ba.buffres.description: Reduce duration of abnormal effects such as <$ba.stun>Stun</>, <$ba.cold>Chill</>, <$ba.frozen>Freeze</> by 50% (Does not stack)

ba.invisible.description: When unblocked/not blocking, will not be attacked by enemies

ba.camou.description: When not blocking, will not be targeted by enemy normal attacks (unable to avoid splash-type attacks)

ba.fragile.description: Increase all damage taken by the stated percentage (Does not stack, strongest effect takes precedence)

ba.shield.description: Each layer of shield can block one instance of damage

ba.protect.description: Reduce Physical and Arts damage taken by the stated percentage (Does not stack, strongest effect takes precedence)

ba.cold.description: Attack Speed -30. If Chill effect is stacked, effect changes to <$ba.frozen>Freeze</>

ba.frozen.description: Unable to move, attack and use skills (Activated through <$ba.cold>Chill</> effect)

ba.sleep.description: Invulnerable and unable to take action

ba.inspire.description: Gain additional stats based on the effect (Strongest effect of each stat takes precedence)

ba.binding.description: When the Tied target is not deployed, forcibly end activated skills, remove all SP and become unable to gain SP

ba.dt.neural.description: When 1000 points of Neural damage is accumulated, receive 1000 True damage become <$ba.stun>Stunned</> for 10 seconds

ba.charged.description: Can continue recovering SP after reaching the maximum. When SP reaches double the maximum, enter Charged state. Skills have additional effects when activated in Charged state (All SP is consumed whenever skill is activated)

ba.strong.description: When HP is higher than a certain percentage, gain a certain amount of ATK (Does not stack, strongest effect takes precedence)

ba.dt.erosion.description: When 1000 points of Corrosion damage is accumulated, permanently decrease DEF by 100 and receive 800 Physical damage

ba.dt.burning.description: When 1000 points of Burn damage is accumulated, decrease RES by 20 for 10 seconds and receive 1200 Arts damage

ba.float.description: Cannot be blocked or targeted by melee attacks

cc.c.abyssal2_1.description: For every <$cc.g.abyssal><@cc.kw>Abyssal Hunters</></> operator stationed at a Craft Station, the CC provides <@cc.vup>5%</> production to every Craft Station with an <$cc.g.abyssal><@cc.kw>Abyssal Hunter</></> stationed, capping at <@cc.vup>45%</> production per Craft Station

cc.c.abyssal2_2.description: For every <$cc.g.abyssal><@cc.kw>Abyssal Hunters</></> operator stationed at a Craft Station, the CC provides <@cc.vup>10%</> production to every Craft Station with an <$cc.g.abyssal><@cc.kw>Abyssal Hunter</></> stationed, capping at <@cc.vup>90%</> production per Craft Station

cc.c.abyssal2_3.description:
Cannot stack with <$cc.m.var2><@cc.rem>Sense of Cooperation</></>, will override
Cannot stack with <$cc.m.pow1><@cc.rem>Automation·α</></>, <$cc.m.pow2><@cc.rem>Automation·β</></> and <$cc.m.pow3><@cc.rem>Bionic Seadragon</></>, will be overridden
